content.rendered: Kakadu Plum lotion is a luxe face and body moisturiser, made with native Australian Kakadu Plum extract & Niacinamide (Vitamin B3). Hailing from the driest of Australian climates, this wonderfruit packs a huge antioxidant hit. Enriched with skin-loving goodies including Shea Butter, Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, and is suitable for most skin types. Smother it on and give your skin the TLC it deserves!

excerpt.rendered:
Meet your skin’s latest squeeze!

  • Free from PABAs and parabens.
  • Australian owned and made.
